venue.name: Microsoft New England Research & Development Center (NERD)

item.description:
"How To Build a Sales and Marketing Machine," a presentation by David Skok at 6:30pm. 

Lean Startup Circle Boston is proud to announce that the March Meetup will be a special presentation by David Skok, General Partner at Matrix Partners. David will discuss the 9 steps required to scale your Sales and Marketing operations to meet the demands of a growing startup. 

 

From optimizing your sales & marketing funnel, to unclogging blocked funnels, David will share his experiences from the many successful SaaS companies he has led or been actively involved with - from SilverStream Software, which he founded and was acquired by Novell, to AppIQ, JBoss, Tabblo and Diligent Technologies, which have all had successful exits. 

 

This is a premier event and speaker that Lean Startup Circle Boston is lucky to have with us this month. Register now - before we fill the room!

 

 

About David Skok

David is a five time serial entrepreneur turned VC, at Matrix Partners. He serves on the boards of CloudBees, CloudSwitch, Digium (makers of the very popular Asterisk Open Source PBX/telephony software), Enservio, HubSpot, OpenSpan, Solidworks, and VideoIQ. David regularly shares expertise and resources for startups and entrepreneurs on his blog, ForEntrepreneurs.com.

 

 

Join us for Early Bird Networking and Pizza at 6pm.
item.name: Lean Startup Circle Boston March Meetup
